name: Hot Honey Pizza
description: Diavolo sauce, mozzarella, asiago, hot honey.

name: White Pizza
description: Fresh mozzarella cheese, garlic oil, micro basil.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: Tomato, mozzarella, provolone.

name: Eggplant Pizza
description: Eggplant, asiago, arugula, aged balsamic.

name: Peppadew Ricotta Pizza
description: Peppadew peppers, marinated tomatoes, fresh ricotta, Parmesan cheese and parsley oil.

name: Chicken Pesto Sandwich
description: Grilled chicken breast, crisp prosciutto, pepperonata, arugula, provolone, and pesto aioli. Served on toasted Italian bread with truffled frites.

name: Meatball Sub
description: Two sliced colossal VIA meatballs with provolone, mozzarella, and marinara sauce. Served on toasted Italian bread with truffled frites.

name: Eggplant Parm Sandwich
description: Crispy fried eggplant with mozzarella, provolone, and marinara. Served on toasted Italian bread with truffled frites.

name: BLT Sandwich
description: Thick cut applewood smoked bacon, fresh mozzarella, vine ripe tomatoes, arugula, sundried tomato aioli, and aged balsamic. Served on toasted Italian bread with truffled frites.

name: Grilled Caesar
description: Seasoned Tuscan bread croutons.

name: Burrata Caprese Salad
description: Fresh burrata mozzarella, heirloom tomato, basil, herb oil, and balsamic reduction.

name: Salmon Arugula Salad
description: Grilled North Atlantic salmon over baby arugula, cubed mozzarella, grape tomatoes, pesto vinaigrette, balsamic reduction.

name: Shrimp Arugula Salad
description: Sautéed shrimp, arugula topped with cannellini beans, served warm with lemon vinaigrette.

name: Chicken Apple Salad
description: Grilled chicken breast with buttery croutons tossed with mixed greens, radicchio, shaved Brussels sprouts, apples, and pickled red onions with grilled lemon vinaigrette.

name: Steak Salad
description: Grilled New York sirloin sliced and served on mixed greens, radicchio, shaved Brussels sprouts, toasted spicy pecans, blue cheese crumbles, and beets, with balsamic vinaigrette.

name: Antipasto Salad
description: Diced salami, ham, chicken, provolone, feta, celery, black olives, capers, tomato, red onion with Dijon vinaigrette.

name: Bolognese on Cheese Ravioli
description: A rich meat sauce of beef, pork, sausage, a touch of tomato paste and cream served on cheese ravioli.

name: Chicken Saltimbocca
description: Sautéed chicken breast, prosciutto, mushrooms, and peas with orecchiette pasta and feta cheese.

name: Eggplant Parmesan
description: Crisp hand-breaded Italian eggplant with mozzarella, provolone, and Parmesan, served with spaghetti marinara.

name: Shrimp Scampi
description: Pan seared shrimp tossed with grape tomatoes, parsley, and a lemon white wine butter sauce served over spaghetti.

name: Shrimp Risotto
description: Pan seared shrimp with spinach, red onion, diced tomatoes, and cannellini beans, served over a tomato and basil risotto topped with crispy prosciutto.

name: Bolognese
description: A rich meat sauce of beef, pork, sausage, a touch of tomato paste and cream.

name: Salmon with Herbed Polenta
description: Pan roasted North Atlantic salmon with stewed tomatoes, red onion, kalamata olives, and capers served over herbed Romano polenta and arugula.

name: Baked Haddock
description: Baked, served with roasted potatoes and asparagus.
